Colour Name:Dual Adaptive | Style Name:USB Type C Cable | Pattern Name:Bundle: Charger + Cable

Samsung Original Adaptive Fast Dual USB In-Car Charger with 1.5 m USB-C Cable, Black
Adaptive quick charging Experience quicker charging speeds with Samsung Adaptive Fast Charging. Using the constructed-in expertise of your Samsung Galaxy S9 – with the official Samsung Adaptive Fast Car Charger you’ll be able to quickly recharge two units. Especially telephones that help Samsung’s adaptive quick charging characteristic and Qualcomm fast cost expertise. Includes a real Samsung USB-C cable This product comes with a 1.5 m Samsung USB-C cable for you to use with your appropriate units. Charge in your automobile with ease in subsequent to no time. Compact design permits you to take it in your travels The charger itself may be very compact which makes it extremely transportable. Ideal for storing in your automotive to be used on quick and lengthy journeys. Easy to retailer and carry round with you The adaptive quick twin automotive charger is available in two separate components (charger and cable) which simply match collectively for fast and handy charging.

Samsung Original USB Type C Charge and Sync Cable – Genuine Samsung USB-A to USB-C Charging Cable for Fast Charging of Mobile Phones and Tablets – 1.5 m – Black
The Samsung USB-C Cable helps you to quick cost your USB-C machine in addition to sync your pictures, music and knowledge to your smartphone or laptop computer at blazing cost and switch speeds. The USB Type C cable can be utilized together with your mains adapter to cost your appropriate Samsung Galaxy smartphone or pill, and additionally works with all different USB-C units.
